welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bradford, a charming city known for its scenic landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to immerse yourself in our vibrant culture and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free public WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lake Simcoe Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lake Simcoe Regional Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
